title: Peanut the Hamster
description: Paul is a writer and Peanut is a hamster. A strangecombination you might think, but they help eachother, the perfect symbiotic partnership.Paul writes stories and Peanut provides the inspiration.Life steams along as they travel together onthe sleeper train. Then, one day, Peanut goes missingand, with him, all of Paulâ€™s story ideas.All that Paul is left with is an old peanut. A reminder ofthe life he once had, but fate had other plans in store.A story about faith, hope and never giving up.You never know what is around the corner!
author: Molly Arbuthnott
